title: Context-Aware Mobile Mathematics Learning Intensive Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and foundational algebraic concepts
context.additional_context: Real-time interaction design optimized for smartphone learning environments, enabling context-based math problem-solving in everyday settings (hospitals/labs)

learning_goals: Learners independently solve at least three real-life math problems (e.g., medication dosage calculations, spatial measurements) occurring in daily environments using smartphone apps
Learners collaboratively perform context-based mathematical modeling processes with over 80% accuracy through real-time video sessions
Learners achieve an average score of 75% or higher after completing five formative assessments on a mobile quiz platform at the end of learning

resources: Calculator App with Basic AR Functionality
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
